description: Creates a pipeline in Continuous Delivery for PE

email.description: The email address associated with the account.

password.description: The password associated with the account.

base64_cacert.description: The CA cert of the CD4PE instance, base64 encoded

insecure_https.description: Whether or not to make the https calls without verifying the CA cert. Only use this on test systems.

workspace.description: Designates the workspace that the pipeline will be created in.

repo_name.description: The control repository associated with the new pipeline.

repo_branch.description: The control repository branch to associate with the new pipeline.

pipeline_type.description: The type of pipeline to create. Must be one of 'control' or 'module'.

resolvable_hostname.description: A resolvable internet address where the Continuous Delivery for PE server can be reached. Required only if the agent certificate is not the machine's resolvable internet address.

web_ui_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the web UI can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the web_ui_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.
